channel.title: Courses on Suryajith Chillara
channel.description: Recent content in Courses on Suryajith Chillara

item.title: CS1.201 Data Structures and Algorithms: Lab (Spring 2023)
item.description: Lab-instructor while Sujit Gujar and Ravi Kiran S are main instructors.

item.title: CS2.201a Computer Systems Organization (Spring 2023)
item.description: Announcements Instructors: Suryajith Chillara and Girish Varma Teaching assistants: Sriram Devata and A Kishore Kumar Schedule: Monday and Tuesday, 14:00 – 15:25 Classroom: H-103 Lectures Part I Introduction to Computer Systems File Class notes References: Chapter 1 of [1] Computer Arithmetic - 1 Class notes References: Sections 2.1 and 2.2 of [1] Computer Arithmetic - 2 Class notes References: Sections 2.

item.title: CS1.406 Advanced Algorithms (Spring 2023)
item.description: Announcements Teaching assistants: Amul Agarwal, Kunal Jain, Nithish Raja Schedule: Tuesday and Friday, 15:35 – 17:00 Classroom: H103 Lectures Introduction to Randomized algorithms, RandQS Class notes (Includes the list of tentative topics) References: Chapter 1 of [1], Chapter 1 & Section 2.4 of [2] Min-Cut, and Las Vegas & Monte carlo Class notes References: Sections 1.1 and 1.2 of [1] and Section 1.

item.title: CS1.301 Algorithm Analysis and Design (Monsoon 2022)
item.description: Announcements Teaching assistants: Posted on Moodle Schedule: Lectures: Wednesday and Saturday, 10:00 – 11:25, Tutorial: Wednesday, 14:00 - 15:00 Classroom: H-105 Lectures Introduction to Algorithm Analysis Class notes (Includes the list of tentative topics) References: Chapter 2 of [1] Basic Graph Algorithms: BFS and DFS Class notes References: Section 3.2 of [1] Basic Graph Algorithms: DFS (contd), and Testing bipartiteness

item.title: CS1.406 Advanced Algorithms (Spring 2022)
item.description: Announcements Teaching assistants: Dixit Kumar Garg and S Shodasakshari Vidya Schedule: Monday and Thursday, 11:30 – 12:55 Classroom: SH-2 (2nd floor, C-1 Vindhya) Problem sets Problem set 1 (Due: 12.01.2022) Problem set 2 (Due: 05.02.2022) Problem set 3 (Due: 07.03.2022) Review Problem set Lectures Introduction to Randomized algorithms, RandQS Class notes (Includes the list of tentative topics) References: Chapter 1 of [1], Chapter 1 & Section 2.

item.title: Teaching at IIT Bombay
item.description: CS 604 - Combinatorics (Spring 2019) Co instructor with Prof. Sundar Vishwanathan. CS721 - Computational Complexity (Monsoon 2018) Co instructor with Prof. Nutan Limaye.
